##
## platform_if_addenda.txt is generated by afu_platform_config as part of
## generate_ase_environment.py.
##
## -F platform_if_addenda.txt

# Gate level libraries to add to simulation
$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/altera_primitives.v
$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/220model.v
$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/sgate.v
$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/altera_mf.v

$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/stratixv_pcie_hip_atoms.v
$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/altera_lnsim.sv
$QUARTUS_HOME/eda/sim_lib/mentor/twentynm_atoms_ncrypt.v

# Required include directories
+incdir+.+@CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/@ASE_SAMPLES@/intg_xeon_nlb/src++incdir+.+./platform_includes+@CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share/opae/platform/platform_if/rtl

# Required defines for NLB
+define+NUM_AFUS=1 +define+NLB400_MODE_0

# Platform includes
platform_includes/platform_afu_top_config.vh
-F platform_includes/platform_if_addenda.txt
-F platform_includes/platform_if_includes.txt

# ASE CCIP emulator
-F @CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/@ASE_SHARE_DIR@/rtl/sources_abs.txt
